Headline: Delays at Howard  Affecting Yellow Line Service
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are experiencing a delay at Howard: due to signal problems. Update to follow.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are experiencing a delay at Howard: due to signal problems

Shuttle buses are available from Skokie to Howard to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Consider using the #97 Skokie bus for alternate service through the affected area.

Updates will be posted as new information becomes available.

Allow extra travel time.
